channel.title: Need help fixing stat bug in testscape source
channel.description: Lets say the person is lvl 1 attack 1/1 and he lvls up now it says 1/2 until he logs out and back in again... how do I fix this... I have tried to figure it out my self but I am new to java... can anyone help[br][size=1]Posted at: November 24, 2006, 07:51:22 PM[/size][hr]is anyone able to fix this?
